Quote: You don't have to control your thoughts. You just have to stop letting them control you.
Author: Dan Millman

Quote: Healing takes time, and asking for help is a courageous step.
Author: Mariska Hargitay

Quote: Almost everything will work again if you unplug it for a few minutes, including you.
Author: Anne Lamott

Quote: You are not a drop in the ocean. You are the entire ocean in a drop.
Author: Rumi

Quote: Feelings are much like waves. We can't stop them from coming but we can choose which ones to surf.
Author: Jonatan MÃ¥rtensson

Quote: Just when the caterpillar thought the world was over, it became a butterfly.
Author: Anonymous

Quote: Your mind will answer most questions if you learn to relax and wait for the answer.
Author: William S. Burroughs

Quote: You carry so much love in your heart. Give some to yourself.
Author: R.Z.

Quote: What lies behind us and what lies before us are tiny matters compared to what lies within us.
Author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

Quote: Every day may not be good. but there's something good in every day.
Author: Alice Morse Earle

Quote: No one is you, and that is your power.
Author: Dave Grohl

Quote: There is no greater agony than bearing an untold story inside you.
Author: Maya Angelou

Quote: You deserve to take up space.
Author: Unknown

Quote: It's okay to rest. You are not a machine.
Author: Nakeia Homer

Quote: The wound is the place where the light enters you.
Author: Rumi

Quote: Sometimes the bravest thing you can do is just show up.
Author: Brené Brown

Quote: You don’t have to be positive all the time. It’s okay to feel sad, angry, annoyed, or anxious. It doesn’t make you a bad person.

Quote: There is hope, even when your brain tells you there isn’t.
Author: John Green

Quote: You are not broken. You are breaking through.
Author: Alex Myles

Quote: Self-care is how you take your power back.
Author: Lalah Delia

Quote: You’re not too much. You’re not too sensitive. Your feelings are valid.
Author: Unknown

Quote: You are enough. You have always been enough.
Author: Unknown

Quote: Be proud of how you’ve been handling these past few months.
Author: Unknown

Quote: You grow through what you go through.
Author: Tyrese Gibson

Quote: You can be a mess and still be a masterpiece.
Author: Unknown

Quote: You are doing better than you think.
Author: Unknown

Quote: Your value doesn’t decrease based on someone’s inability to see your worth.
Author: Unknown

Quote: Rest is productive.
Author: The Nap Ministry

Quote: Not everything that weighs you down is yours to carry.

Quote: Let yourself be proud of small things.
Author: Unknown

Quote: You can feel anxious and still show up.

Quote: You don’t need permission to rest.
Author: Unknown

Quote: Every step forward counts, even if it’s small.

Quote: You are not alone, even when it feels like it.

Quote: You are worthy of love, even on the days you don’t feel it.
Author: Unknown

Quote: You don’t need to fix yourself. You were never broken.
Author: Unknown

Quote: You are allowed to be both a masterpiece and a work in progress.
Author: Sophia Bush

Quote: Take time to do what makes your soul happy.
Author: Unknown

Quote: It’s okay to ask for help. You don’t have to do it all alone.
Author: Unknown

Quote: You survived the days you thought you couldn’t.
Author: Unknown

Quote: Your pace is perfect for your path.
Author: Unknown

Quote: You don’t have to have it all figured out to move forward.
Author: Unknown

Quote: You are allowed to outgrow people, places, and versions of yourself.
Author: Unknown

Quote: You are not behind. You’re exactly where you need to be.
Author: Unknown

Quote: Healing isn’t linear, and that’s okay.
Author: Unknown

Quote: You are not too much. You are enough.
Author: Unknown

Quote: You are more than your productivity.

Quote: Some days, just getting out of bed is a win.
